body: This spell functions as holy ice, except it is made of frozen unholy water rather than holy water.
description: Create wall or javelins of frozen unholy water.

effects.text: wall of ice or flying ice javelins (see text)
effects.name: Effect

components.text: a flask of unholy water or 5 pounds of powdered silver worth 25 gp

duration: 1 minute/level, instantaneous, or until expended (see text)
component_text: V, S, M (a flask of unholy water or 5 pounds of powdered silver worth 25 gp)
name: Unholy Ice
